U

UnknownConfigFormatException - exception com.topcoder.util.config.UnknownConfigFormatException.
Thrown when specified format of configuration properties is not in list of valid values, that are : ConfigManager.CONFIG_XML_FORMAT, ConfigManager.CONFIG_MULTIPLE_XML_FORMAT, ConfigManager.CONFIG_PROPERTIES_FORMAT, ConfigManager.CONFIG_PLUGGABLE_FORMAT
UnknownConfigFormatException() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.config.UnknownConfigFormatException
Constructs an UnknownConfigFormaException with null as its error detail message.
UnknownConfigFormatException(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.config.UnknownConfigFormatException
Constructs an UnknownConfigFormatException with the specified detail message.
UnknownNamespaceException - exception com.topcoder.util.config.UnknownNamespaceException.
Thrown from any of ConfigManager's methods (except existsNamespace() that is invoked with namespace that does not exist within ConfigManager

Constructs an UnknownNamespaceException with null as its error detail message.
